name: Buzzerlightyear
tagline: Simple buzzer web app (because every time someone holds a trivia event it gets hostile)
body:
# Buzzer

A buzzer for trivia games.

## Usage

Make a `vars.js` with a Firebase app URL. Then:
```
cd /path/to/repo
node server.js
```
App is at `http://localhost:8080/index.html/`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
